title: A new balade or songe, of the Lambes feast Another, out of goodwill.
author: W. S., veritatis amator.
notes: Signed: Per VV.S. veritatis amatorem, i.e. William Samuel? William Seres? Entered under Hendrik Niclaes in STC 1st ed.
Two ballads printed side by side; first lines "I hearde one saye: com now awaye," and "The grace from God the Father hye,".
Also identified as STC 18559 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1475-1640" reel 421.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery ("Early English books, 1475-1640" reel 421), and the British Library (Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 2123).
Two halves split and rejoined; cropped at right, with loss of marginal notes.
